## HelpBuilderOptions.keyMap property

Key map providing help bindings (required).

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyMap: KeyMap;
```

## Remarks

The key map provides the bindings to display in the help view via `shortHelp()` and `fullHelp()` methods.
